bio: We are a Public Goods DAO focused on Education for the Brazilian and portuguese-speaking communities, focused on the Ethereum DeFi ecosystem.
contributionDescription:
Since its inception, we have provided intense coverage, mainly written, on the development of the Optimism ecosystem for Portuguese readers. Simplifying and making technical knowledge accessible to the community in general. 

The work consisted of research, translation, review and coordination of more than 10 people in maintaining this path of education.

Here we have some examples of this educational content:

contributionLinks.description: Dedicated Article about the Optimism Collective
Dedicated Article about the Optimism NFT ecosystem
Translated Guide for the Optimism Ecosystem
Dedicated Article on the actual state of the Optimism Ecosystem
Youtube Live about Layer 2, where we included an introduction on Optimism

impactDescription:
About Collective Governance:

Our content helped thousands of people to better understand the collective's governance system, and understand its values ​​and how to contribute.

Simplifying onboarding in their own language.

About End User Experience & Adoption:

Our easy yet native content provided a better understanding of the role of layers 2 in the ethereum ecosystem, consensus systems and scalability. But not only conceptual understanding, it also helped in a practical way, by understanding how to access a wallet, add the network, make bridges and interact with DeFi protocols on-chain.
